query: SELECT a.id, a.fileName, a.fileKey, a.fileUrl, a.fileSize, a.mimeType, a.description, a.createdAt, ac.name as categoryName FROM assets a LEFT JOIN asset_categories ac ON a.categoryId = ac.id ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC LIMIT 200;
